description: Imparts a 1-frame randomly-jittered impulse on physics objects in a radius.

params.name: center
description: The world position of the center of the cylinder.

params.name: outer radius
description: The radius beyond which the force is zero.

params.name: inner radius
description: The radius within which the force is maximum.

params.name: force
description: A vector giving the direction and magnitude of the force of the explosion.
